Imagination is more important than knowledge

I'm a Manchester-based designer and front-end developer. I help businesses grow through design and code.

Webdesign & UI

Users evaluate a design in 50 milliseconds. You need people to take your brand seriously. I will help you make those first few milliseconds count.

Web development

I take great care to ensure each project is well-documented and easily maintainable so you can enhance a website or an app as your company grows.

Digital Strategy

I’ll work with you to understand your business and make sure everything we do aligns with your goals.

Webdesign & UI

I believe that good design is more than how it looks. As one famous person said “Most people make the mistake of thinking design is what it looks like. That’s not what we think design is. Design is how it works”. I'll help you make it special.

  • Tailored to your needs
  • High quality original designs
  • Competitors research
  • Wireframing

Web development

I believe in goals, not tools. Laravel is my favourite PHP Framework but I have specialist working knowledge of a raft of different software platforms incuding Wordpress, Opencart, ExpressionEngine.

  • Well-documented and easily maintainable code
  • Latest trends and best practices
  • Ecommerce expertise
  • Transparent process

Digital Strategy

I’ll work with you every step of the way to make sure your business’ digital strategy is a success.

  • Competitive Audits
  • Roadmapping
  • Goals Assessment
  • Experience Planning

Art Direction

"I believe a story can be brought to life with the right combination of copy, images and animation. Every story deserves a unique approach to reach people in an engaging way." Vito Salvatore, Designer

“When I received the finished products I was more than pleased, I have received many complements on the quality of my website and branding. I will definitely be using Adam again.”

Sarah Taylor, Taylor Made Cupcakes

Digital Training

I have worked as a front-end developer and lead designer since 2000 in a variety of in-house and freelance roles for print publications, agencies, start-ups, and private clients. I can help you with things like:

  • GIT training
  • Design advice
  • Laravel training
  • Javascript training

Get in touch

If you would like to say hello or discuss a potential project then please drop me a line. I would love to hear your story.
